archimate:Requirement.name: PE-3(2): Physical Access Control | Facility and Systems
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Perform security checks [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] at the physical perimeter of the facility or system for exfiltration of information or removal of system components.

properties.value: Organizations determine the extent, frequency, and/or randomness of security checks to adequately mitigate risk associated with exfiltration.
